features: BLACKOUT WINDOW CURTAIN: Embrace chic rustic style with the Elrene Home Fashions buffalo-plaid blackout single curtain panel. Add country style and sun protection with this blackout panel.

RUSTIC PATTERN & DESIGN: The blackout lining effectively reduces noise, light, and temperature, all with a lovely plaid pattern. The trendy distressed, checkered home decor complements any farm aesthetic.

HIGH-QUALITY HOME DECOR: Made from a blend of durable 80% polyester and 20% linen, this country curtain has a 3-inch rod pocket and back tab hanging options and can fit up to a 1-inch-diameter curtain rod.
FASHIONABLE & EASY CARE: Great looks meet easy care with this lovely curtain panel. Each window panel requires only a simple machine wash to stay stylish and beautiful.

FOUR GENERATIONS OF QUALITY & FASHION: Elrene Home Fashions has been designing and producing high-quality home decor since 1922. We focus on creating decorator looks and exciting designs for your home.
body.description: Elrene Home Fashions provides beautifully fashionable home decor to suit any decorating taste. Capture that farmhouse style with the Elrene Home Fashions Farmhouse Living Grainger Buffalo-Check Blackout Window Panel for your bedroom, living room, kitchen, or office. Easy to hang, this panel has a 3-inch rod pocket and back tab hanging options that will fit up to a 1-inch-diameter curtain rod. This single drape comes in a variety of colored, distressed, buffalo-checkered patterns to add simple elegance to the windows throughout your home.Add to the beauty and farm style of any room while blocking the sun and protecting furniture. The inner lining of this lovely single panel reduces light, sound, and temperature, making it ideal for bedrooms or to protect furniture from sun and heat exposure. High-quality material makes this curtain a must-have for your home. Made from a blend of durable 80% polyester and 20% linen, this curtain is sturdy, keeps its great looks, hangs beautifully, and has a wonderful texture, weight, and thickness to stand up to daily use and sunshine. Simple care means a machine wash is all that is needed to keep this drape looking amazing. This curtain is a worthy investment for your home and is available in multiple sizes.Established in 1922, Elrene Home Fashions was founded on the principles of quality and guaranteed satisfaction. With the help of our expert artists and designers, we produce high-quality, fashionable home decor for every home and decorating palate. We are 100% committed to our customers and strive to give the very best in all of our products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Everything You Need for a Modern Country Home Farmhouse Living Bath This beautiful and trendy shower curtain collection of is the perfect addition to your décor. Farmhouse Living Kitchen Our amazing kitchen collection is as functional as it is beautiful. We offer towels with terry cloth reverse for extra absorbency, pot mitts and holders that protect from heat, durable kitchen mats that can withstand high traffic areas and more. Our items are sure to impress, both as décor and when tackling all your kitchen tasks. Farmhouse Living Window Offering Tiers, Valances, and Window Panels, our window line is the perfect finishing piece to any farmhouse-inspired kitchen or home. Add with other pieces from of our line to create a fully coordinated look or use individually for a touch of rustic elegance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really high quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for one room several years ago and decided to put them throughout the living areas so was thrilled to find them again. They are super high quality, really heavy - so purchase a good solid curtain rod along with - and give good light, sound, and heat insulation. The backing is a silvery gray if that matters to you. I hung all mine for a few days then steamed while up. You have the option of a rod pocket up top or the tabs that make them look more pleated. In the past I've preferred the rod pocket for gathers but I didn't try it with these because I felt they were too heavy to gather and wanted a more crisp look. The checks match up pretty well. If you're ordering multiple panels, you may have to take a moment and see which panels match best and arrange accordingly but for the most part they're pretty close. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are fabulous, well made, high quality, great priced, lined curtains. We have these in linen in our living and dining and bought the deep red for our bedroom for Christmas time. They are great and drape well. We have another style of erlene lined curtains and you can’t go wrong with them. Would but for every room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are excellent quality. Made beautifully. Fabric is high-quality and heavy so they hang nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars substantial fabric, sewn well so the pattern matches
reviews.reviewText: These are really nice curtains! The fabric is substantial, and has a nice texture to it. Attached pictures show 4 curtain panels over a large bank of windows in the afternoon. You can see that the pattern carries across all 4, which is something you can't always count on!They do block light, but as you can see I wouldn't call them "blackout". The liner is a light grey/silver, and you can see it up close and from the outside. For true blackout, you could add a blackout layer to the back. I've done that with other curtains, and it's really easy if you use clips to hang - literally just a matter of clipping them to the curtain you are already hanging (personally I like rings on the rods because I find the curtains easier to open and close than when you put the curtains directly on the rod.).A few FYIs:- IMO they need to be ironed before hanging. They come nicely folded but there are definitely fold marks if you don't iron them (I tried :-).- The curtains didn't go through a final rinse at the factory, and as a result some color came off on my hands while I was hanging. I put additional curtains in other parts of the room and did a cold water quick wash/light dry on them before hanging. It didn't change the color of the curtains and they didn't shrink, but it did make them slightly softer, which was nice. It also meant that I didn't have to iron those - grab warm out of the dryer and they're good to go!- What appears to be white isn't a bright white. It more of a light beige, as you can see in the closeup. It's a nice light neutral, but be aware that if you want pure bright white - these aren't.Great curtains, reasonable price, I recommend and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are gorgeous curtains! High quality and worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these curtains. Met all my expectations and more. They are well made. I made a great choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are super cute and good quality - but we bought them to be blackout curtains and light absolutely comes through. So lost a star for that… :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and good quality!
reviews.reviewText: I love how it looks. It’s medium thick. Had a white layer behind

La verdad están muy bien estas cortinas l, muy gruesas, pesadas, siento que aíslan elFrío y el ruido muy bien, solo que no revise bien la descripción y no vi que solo era un panel,se venden separados, te quw pe pedir el otro pero la verdad están súper buenas y bonitas, las recomiendo me encantaron 😍

After I read the reviews I decided to buy these curtains. To be honest I was skeptical of the quality of curtains from Amazon but was pleasantly surprised. Barely wrinkled. Thick quality fabric. Blocks out the light. My photo of them is not the best due to lack of natural light in my apartment this time of year. But I absolutely love them and totally the French feel look I was wanting. I feel the price pf the curtains were worth it. I was worried when I looked at the measurements that I needed another panel for my balcony doors but turns out I don't. They fit perfect when pulling them closed at night (I ordered 2 packages - one panel per package). Happy with these curtains!Update: I bought 2 panels for my bedroom and love them. However now that my apartment gets the direct sun in the early mornings these curtains do no block the light well at all. I wear a face mask now. However they are good quality curtains and look amazing. They block the night lights for me just not the direct sunlight in the mornings! I still give them a 5 star!

reviews.reviewerName: MR D H PERRYMR D H PERRY
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wife got these for new decorated room to match our blue colourShe turned them up as slightly to long and they fit lovely.She is very pleased with them.

Impressed with the quality of these curtains. I ordered the linen colour which is a lovely muted beige and cream combo. The fabric is heavy weight so they hang nicely to the floor. They are easy to hem. They do come creased from packaging and it is worth the effort to steam iron them. They look expensive and make my dining room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad, entrega rápida, satisfecha con la compra, me gustaron bastante.
reviews.reviewText: Las utilice para mi recamara, si cumplieron mis expectativas, me gusto el diseño,impiden que pase la luz e igual reducen el ruido, la verdad estoy satisfecha con el producto.
